txt.en: VIPs can return to Hengstacer farm at level twenty and receive a quest from Ã‰ogar; completing this quest will reward VIPs with the Basic Riding passive skill.\n\nFree Players & Premium Players must purchase the riding passive skill from the LOTRO Store in order to earn the various mount skills available in the game. This can be done by visiting the LOTRO Store after completing the New Player Experience and earning the Novice passive skill.
How do I acquire the basic riding passive skill?
